医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CAR-T免疫疗法可有效对抗实体瘤伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，如果确定了正确的靶标，CAR-T 免疫疗法可以有效对抗实体瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/CAR-T-immune-therapies-could-be- effective-against-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/CAR-T-immune-therapies-could-be- effective-against-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb8c4757-3765-4b4a-afef-3934ba4cc9cb Thu, 03 Aug 2023 13:33:14 -0400 CAR-T immune therapies could be effective against solid tumors
肠道微生物组的变化对可卡因的使用和渴望有显着影响根据 2021 年全国药物使用与健康调查，过去 12 个月内有 480 万人（12 岁及以上）报告使用可卡因，24,486 人因服用可卡因过量而死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Gut-microbiome-changes-have-significant-effects-on-cocaine-use-and-cravings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Gut-microbiome-changes-have-significant-effects-on-cocaine-use-and-cravings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84b18907-7baf-4a78-bc7b-4ca07471da8c Thu, 03 Aug 2023 13:24:20 -0400 Gut microbiome changes have significant effects on cocaine use and cravings
多巴胺神经元在运动控制中发挥的作用可能比之前想象的更大多巴胺：不再只是为了奖励。在西北大学领导的一项新研究中，研究人员识别并记录了小鼠模型中脑区域多巴胺神经元的三种遗传亚型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Dopamine-neurons-may-play-a-bigger-role-in-motor-control-than-previously-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Dopamine-neurons-may-play-a-bigger-role-in-motor-control-than-previously-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19bd7097-409b-4e71-8389-26f64150e2d0 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 13:18:53 -0400 Dopamine neurons may play a bigger role in motor control than previously thought
新研究发现普通真菌与胰腺癌之间没有联系四年前，一份关于一种常见真菌可能引发胰腺癌的报告为这种致命疾病提供了一个有希望的新观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/New-study-finds-no-link- Between-common-fungus-and-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/New-study-finds-no-link- Between-common-fungus-and-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1eec431c-3408-4007-a2e6-6491006e9183 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 13:10:36 -0400 New study finds no link between common fungus and pancreatic cancer
弗吉尼亚理工大学的学生获得国家科学基金会的支持，以开展关于超加工食品对健康影响的新研究扎克·胡特林 (Zach Hutelin) 是弗吉尼亚理工大学转化生物学、医学和健康 (TBMH) 研究生项目的博士生，获得了著名的国家科学基金会奖学金，以开展关于超加工食品对健康影响的新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Virginia-Tech-student-receives-NSF-support-to-pursue-new-line-of-research-into-the-health-impact-of-超加工食品.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Virginia-Tech-student-receives-NSF-support-to-pursue-new-line-of-research-into-the-health-impact-of-超加工食品.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae762f10-c484-4db5-8b62-be5dc3e29dae Thu, 03 Aug 2023 13:04:55 -0400 Virginia Tech student receives NSF support to pursue new line of research into the health impact of ultra-processed foods
研究揭示了子宫内膜异位症相关盆腔疼痛的原因患有子宫内膜异位症的女性的盆腔疼痛是由神经炎症引起的。研究人员调查了子宫内膜异位症相关盆腔疼痛的生化介质，为识别改善症状和生活质量的新药物奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Research-sheds-light-on-the-causes-of-endometriosis-lated-pelvic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Research-sheds-light-on-the-causes-of-endometriosis-lated-pelvic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bd2f8ec-e0b0-4912-83ed-bb8077315908 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 12:39:18 -0400 Research sheds light on the causes of endometriosis-related pelvic pain
AGA 宣布支持重新引入《治疗和减少肥胖法案》美国胃肠病学协会 (AGA) 今天宣布支持重新引入《治疗和减少肥胖法案》(TROA)，该法案将扩大医疗保险覆盖范围，将各类专门从事肥胖症护理的医疗保健提供者提供的肥胖症筛查和治疗纳入其中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/AGA-announces-support-for-the-reintroduced-Treat-and-Reduce-Obesity-Act.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/AGA-announces-support-for-the-reintroduced-Treat-and-Reduce-Obesity-Act.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6280bb29-b311-4b09-87d5-247229b3e54f Thu, 03 Aug 2023 12:01:51 -0400 AGA announces support for the reintroduced Treat and Reduce Obesity Act
Insilico Medicine 的新人工智能工具在预测临床试验结果方面显示出前景Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段端到端生成人工智能（AI）药物发现公司，已证明它可以使用其专有的基于变压器的技术来预测 II 期至 III 期临床试验的成功结果人工智能临床试验预测工具inClinico，具有很高的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Insilico-Medicines-new-AI-tool-shows-promise-in-predicting-clinical-trial-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Insilico-Medicines-new-AI-tool-shows-promise-in-predicting-clinical-trial-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7efd410b-db70-410d-98b7-0dd55a99d4c3 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 11:58:04 -0400 Insilico Medicine's new AI tool shows promise in predicting clinical trial outcomes
生活质量是心力衰竭死亡和住院的独立预测因素宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。心力衰竭 (HF) 通常与生活质量 (QoL) 差相关。描述中国心力衰竭患者健康相关生活质量 (HRQL) 的数据有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Quality-of-life-is-an-independent-predictor-of-death-and-hospitalization-in-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Quality-of-life-is-an-independent-predictor-of-death-and-hospitalization-in-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74b8aba4-e7c7-45d5-a16a-0bc35d8cdfcc Thu, 03 Aug 2023 11:48:37 -0400 Quality of life is an independent predictor of death and hospitalization in heart failure
纳米工程生物墨水提高肿瘤模型的准确性Terasaki 生物医学创新研究所的科学家开发了一种纳米工程生物墨水，具有改进的粘合和交联能力，可用于肿瘤模型的 3D 生物打印。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Nanoengineered-bioink-improves-tumor-model-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Nanoengineered-bioink-improves-tumor-model-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76f9ffe0-e3de-483e-aa5d-747b12a28c2e Thu, 03 Aug 2023 11:40:00 -0400 Nanoengineered bioink improves tumor model accuracy
